content:
EventTags Enum

In this Article

Specifies the tracking of activity start and stop events. You should only use the lower 24 bits. For more information, see EventSourceOptions and stem.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write*.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Flags]
public enum EventTags

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ValueType
  • System.Enum
  • EventTags

Fields

None

Specifies no tag and is equal to zero.
